insert into sys_sequence (SEQUENCE_ID, seq_Type, INIT_SEQ_VALUE, STEP_LENGTH, SEQ_LENGTH, NEXT_SEQ_VALUE, PRE_SEQ_CODE, pk1Value, pk2Value, pk3Value, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUM) values (#{sequenceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seqType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initSeqValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stepLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seqLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextSeqValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preSeqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pk1Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pk2Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pk3Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 1)

mapper.update:
update sys_sequence
seq_Type = #{seqType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_SEQ_VALUE = #{initSeqValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEP_LENGTH = #{stepLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEQ_LENGTH = #{seqLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEXT_SEQ_VALUE = #{nextSeqValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRE_SEQ_CODE = #{preSeqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pk1Value = #{pk1Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pk2Value = #{pk2Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pk3Value = #{pk3Value,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, OBJECT_VERSION_NUM = OBJECT_VERSION_NUM + 1
where sequence_Id = #{sequenceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
